missedPatterns.description: Monorepo package structure with component packages not being scanned properly
missedPatterns.suggestedDetection: Improve workspace detection to recursively scan all workspace packages for components

improvements.title: Advanced React Component Pattern Detection
improvements.description: Enhance scanner to recognize modern React patterns including forwardRefWithAs, render props with TypeScript generics, and complex component function patterns beyond basic component detection
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would catch 4+ components in this repo alone

improvements.title: Workspace-Aware Scanning
improvements.description: Improve workspace detection to automatically discover and scan all packages in monorepo structures, including nested package.json files and workspace configurations
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would discover entire component libraries in monorepos

improvements.title: Implicit Design Token Detection
improvements.description: Detect repeated className patterns and styling strings as implicit design tokens, even in unstyled component libraries
examples: rounded-md border border-gray-300 bg-white px-2 py-1

improvements.title: Cross-Component Style Drift Detection
improvements.description: Compare styling patterns across components to identify duplicated or inconsistent design implementations
examples: Identical className strings in Button and Input components
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would catch 1+ drift pattern in this repo

improvements.title: TypeScript Component Interface Detection
improvements.description: Enhance TypeScript parsing to recognize component prop interfaces and render prop type definitions as component indicators
examples: type ButtonRenderPropArg = { disabled: boolean; hover: boolean; }
improvements.estimatedImpact: Would improve component detection accuracy by 50%
